fact.text: Napoleon Was Once Attacked By a Horde of Bunnies.
Thomas Edison Didnt Invent the Light Bulb.
All British tanks since 1945 have included equipment to make tea.
Hitler, Mussolini, and Stalin Were All Nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize.
The swastika was actually a symbol of good -- until the Nazis got ahold of it.
Plastic surgery was invented because of World war 1.
More than 600 assassination attempts were committed on Fidel Castro.
The army of Alexander the great reached India in 327 BC.
Rome's emperor, Gaius Julius Caesar Augustus Germanicus, also known as Caligula, made one of his favorite horses a senator.
The Anglo-Zanzibar War is the shortest war in recorded history. The war, which was between the United Kingdom and the Zanzibar Sultanate, lasted only 38 minutes in 1896.
The great Omaha Indian Chief Blackbird was said to have loved his horse so much that he was buried sitting on top of it.
